nodes.text: Columi Mental Hoverpods were essentially floating metal chairs which could move in response to mental commands. Each pod was 3 meters long and equipped with a fusion power generator. It could hold only one person but also carry 50 kilograms of cargo. It could hover 3 meters off the ground and move 120 kmh. It cost 1,500 credits.

While originally only the Columi—who created the pods—could use them, technological advances resulted in versions for Humans, Hutts, Duros, Sullustans and Bith. Some beings who operated the pods experienced side effects, such as nausea, unless they took a stabilizing serum.
